Text.Language: Ouwou nem outaio: outaio nem ouwou: n~]pana~gia~ Triac Viwt nem Ps/ri nem Pip~neuma eyouab.
Glory and honor, honor and glory to the All-Holy Trinity, the Father and the Son and the Holy Spirit.
